pkgmetadata.longdescription: Symbolic Representation of the Determinant of a Square Matrix // Produces the formula for calculating the determinant, as a function of the elements of the matrix. This formula is called the symbolic representation of the determinant. In other words, for the 2x2 matrix V we want a function to return 'v11v22 v12v21' for an unstructured, general 2x2 matrix and 'v11v22 v12^2' for a symmetric 2x2 matrix, and not the numeric values for a particular numeric matrix.
